attributes.action: Make financially responsible the organisation or person who loses people's personal data leading to identity theft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether it be government, organisation, or an individual; If people's personal data is kept insecurely and it is subsequently lost or stolen, that government, organisation or individual should be financially responsible for the expenses incurred, suffering and any other related problems of the person or people it affects.
